name: Private Tour Guide And Peraonal Local Guide To Show You The Real Beauty Of Suzhou
description: Suzhou previously transliterated as Su-chou, Suchow, is a major city located in the southeast of Jiangsu Province in Eastern China, adjacent to Shanghai Municipality. The city situated on the lower reaches of the Yangtze River and on the shores of Taihu Lake and is a part of the Yangtze River Delta region. Built in 514 BCE, Suzhou has over 2,500 years of rich history and relics of the past are maintained to this day. The city's stone bridges, pagodas, and meticulously designed gardens have contributed to its status as one of the top tourist attractions in China. Since the Song Dynasty (960-1279), it has also been an important centre for China's silk industry. It is occasionally dubbed the "Venice of the East" or "Venice of China".
